name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with over 10 years of experience in software quality assurance, specializing in **Selenium**, **JUnit**, **API testing**, and **UI testing**. Proficient in a range of programming languages including **Java**, **C#**, **Golang**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, with strong skills in **test-driven development** and **continuous integration**. Experienced in agile methodologies, leveraging **Git** for effective version control and collaboration. Additionally, possess excellent communication skills and task management abilities to coordinate cross-functional teams effectively.
Demonstrated expertise in full stack development with a solid background in **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with a profound understanding of cloud-native solutions on **Azure** and **AWS**. Proven track record in leading the development of enterprise platforms that integrate AI/ML for enhanced analytics and automation. Passionate about driving impact through quality software while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Conducted comprehensive **API testing** using Selenium, JUnit, and various other tools, ensuring high quality across healthcare and fintech applications at scale.
•	Led **UI testing** initiatives utilizing a combination of **JavaScript**, **CSS**, and **HTML** frameworks to enhance user experience and validate functionality across platforms.
•	Employed **Golang**, **Java**, and **C#** for automated testing scripts to ensure robustness and performance standards are met within applications.
•	Implemented continuous integration practices by integrating automated tests into pipelines with **Git** and **agile methodology**, enhancing deployment efficiency by **30%**.
•	Developed and maintained test-driven development practices that improved code quality and reduced bugs in production by **25%** over a year-long period.
•	Managed task prioritization and communication within the QA team, fostering collaboration and ensuring timely delivery against project milestones.
•	Created comprehensive test strategies using tools like Jest, Postman, and used automated frameworks to achieve **95%** test coverage across critical application components.
•	Collaborated with development teams to establish effective feedback loops, ensuring that testing outcomes accurately informed development cycles.
•	Supported the shift-left testing approach by integrating testing activities earlier into the development lifecycle, promoting a culture of quality across teams.

Conducted rigorous **API testing** and **UI testing** to ensure the reliability and performance of financial applications, utilizing **Selenium** and **JUnit** to automate test cases and enhance quality assurance processes.
Collaborated effectively with development teams, applying **agile methodology** to streamline project workflows and improve communication throughout the software development lifecycle.
Utilized **Git** for version control, managing code changes across multiple branches and facilitating continuous integration to maintain code integrity across projects.
Participated in **test-driven development** practices, ensuring that test cases are defined before coding to lead to cleaner, more maintainable code in financial platforms.
Implemented comprehensive test strategies for applications built in **Java**, **C#**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring high-quality deliverables that meet industry standards for usability and performance.
Coordinated task management among team members to efficiently prioritize testing activities and meet project deadlines, resulting in a **20%** reduction in bug turnaround time.
Fostered effective communication skills in cross-functional teams to promptly address issues and ensure a thorough understanding of quality expectations across **3** financial platforms undergoing modernization.

Conducted comprehensive **API testing** for various backend services utilizing **Java**, **Golang**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring robust functionality and seamless integration within the global e-commerce platform.
Executed end-to-end **UI testing** on web applications using **Selenium** and **JUnit** to validate user interfaces across multiple devices and browsers, achieving a **95%** test coverage.
Implemented and maintained **test-driven development** practices to support high-quality code delivery, ensuring reliability and performance with minimum disruption to ongoing operations.
Collaborated within an **agile methodology** framework to efficiently manage and prioritize testing tasks in alignment with team objectives, contributing to a **30%** reduction in release times.
Developed automated test scripts using **Selenium** and **Java** that integrated with **Git** for version control, significantly improving the development and testing processes.
Facilitated continuous integration efforts by integrating test automation into the pipeline, ensuring immediate feedback for developers and maintaining project standards during the development lifecycle.
Utilized **JavaScript**, **CSS**, and **HTML** to create user test cases that reflect real-world usage patterns, improving the effectiveness of the test suite.
Enhanced communication skills for cross-team collaboration, ensuring all stakeholders are informed about testing progress and results, resulting in improved project transparency.
Monitored application performance and user feedback post-deployment, iterating on test strategies to address any emerging issues proactively and ensuring user satisfaction.
